sentences.sContent: A slender, elongated, threadlike object or structure.
sentences.sContent_eng: A slender, elongated, threadlike object or structure.
sentences.sCn: 纤维一种细长的线状物体或组织。

sentences.sContent: Any of the threadlike filaments forming the mycelium of a fungus.
sentences.sContent_eng: Any of the threadlike filaments forming the mycelium of a fungus.
sentences.sCn: 丝，丝状组织丝状的结构；细丝。

remMethod.val: thread(线) + like(像…一样) → 像线一样 → 线状的

words.tran: 线的；粘丝状的；纤维构成的；纤细的
线；螺纹；思路；衣服；线状物；玻璃纤维；路线
